RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOMEBODYLOVESYOU broke in front, gave up the lead soon thereafter, pressed the pace two wide down the backstretch, made the lead entering the turn, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best under brisk handling. SISTER CODE stalked the pace into the stretch, had a mild rally in the six path and finished clear for second. DANZING CHICK away alertly, set the early pace along the inside under pressure from the winner,. had speed into the stretch then weakened late. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN failed to menace. HAZANNE allowed to settle, moved up along the rail into the stretch then came up empty. SUPER FOLLOW trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Yacht Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Follow
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Danzing Chick
ENTRY.OWNER: DaCosta Jason and Brown John E
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally 6path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Hazanne
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move rail, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Somebodylovesyou
ENTRY.OWNER: Snowden, Steve, Arnold, Douglas S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, assumed command entering turn, much best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Buck Pond Farm Inc. & Steve Snowden

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 27. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU ARE AWESOME stalked the pace through the turn, closed three then two wide through the stretch and was along in time under confident handling. HOLY SAINT dueled for the lead two wide into the turn, gained a narrow advantage, set the balance of the pace, dug in gamely but couldn't handle the winner. SEMINOLE JUSTICE battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch, drifted out late and faded. TENTWELVEFOURTEEN failed to menace. NANO was no threat. BOO BE RIGHT had brief speed near the inside and stopped on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Nano
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Tentwelvefourteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Boo Be Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, stopped turn

ENTRY.NAME: Seminole Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, drifted out lane, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2w, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: You Are Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 27. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY unhurried early, closed willingly inside rivals into the stretch, made the lead in deep stretch and prevailed under strong handling. ORBALINE chased the pace into the stretch, rallied three wide to gain a narrow lead briefly before the furlong marker and finished second best. BEND THE KNEE broke in full stride to set the pace into the stretch off the rail then was outfinished. FLYING BUSINESS stalked the early pace, offered a strong bid four wide into the stretch then leveled off. LEADING INDICATOR was restless in the gate then failed to menace. HER GOLD MINE was no factor. O K BABY was no threat. CYBERBURG no outrun. GOLDEN LASSIE reared hitting the gate at the start, buck jumped causing her rider to lose his irons and was distanced. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Her Gold Mine
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Lassie
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared, hit gate, buck jumped, lost irons, distanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Bend the Knee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Leading Indicator
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed willingly inside, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 4 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Orbaline
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 3 wide, led, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Cyberburg
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 27 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWINSPIREDJOEY never far back, closed fast three wide through deep stretch while being forced out by the leader and got up in the final stride. AINT NO BANDLEADER broke in front, prompted the pace two wide for five sixteenths of a mile, regained command, set the balance of the pace, drifted out late under left handed urging and just missed hanging on. MIXTER JENSEN bumped at the start, settled near the inside, swung wide and finished with good courage in the middle of the racetrack. PRIMITIVO sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace to the seven sixteenths pole, prompted the pace into the stretch then weakened late. HAPPY TAKEOVER was bumped at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Mixter Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, swung wide, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Primitivo
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead inside, set pace 7/16pole, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Aint No Bandleader
ENTRY.OWNER: Estvanko Christina and JSR Stables Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, drifted, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Twinspiredjoey
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed fast, 3 wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAN MAMIBELLA well placed, closed willingly three wide through the turn, made the lead in upper stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best. MYRRH stalked the early pace, loomed boldly between horses two wide nearing the quarter pole then was no match for the winner. MON PARADIS trailed into the turn, avoided a rival in distress then found her best stride late three wide. SABELLE away alertly, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then weakened. TARA DAWN was no factor. DYNA'S HOLIDAY was no threat. CROSSTOWN GIRL was outrun. WILLYMAR settled mid pack then lacked the needed response. RAP STAR pressed the early pace along the rail, suffered a catastrophic injury into the turn, pulled up and was euthanized.

ENTRY.NAME: Crosstown Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Rap Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed rail, pulled up injured turn

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Paradis
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, avoided rival into turn, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Willymar
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Myrrh
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly between horses 1/4 pole, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position, rallied 3 wide turn, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Tara Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sabelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dyna's Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET VALERIA with the second flight along the inside, shifted out past the quarter pole, closed willingly in the six path under right handed urging to make the lead in deep stretch and drew clear. V K STAR unhurried early, rallied determinedly through the stretch in the seven path and got up for second. DAYS REMEMBERED pressed the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. VOODOOISM passed tiring rivals. GREGS POSSE away alertly, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then gave way in the final furlong. MARIMBA stalked the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. VAVITE was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Valeria
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, angled out 1/4 pole, rallied 6path, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Days Remembered
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, outfinished 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Gregs Posse
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Marimba
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: V K Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally widest, up place 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Voodooism
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 27. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KADESH vied for the lead four then three wide through the turn, drifted in at the top of the stretch, surged late and got up in time two wide. UNYIELDING pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and just missed hanging on. AGAVE KID set a pressured pace three then two wide into the stretch, checked when the winner drifted in at the three sixteenths pole then was outfinished. BEACH FRONT failed to menace. UNION BROTHER offered a mild bid inside rivals into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. AULD LANGE SYNE was no factor. NOBLE BEHAVIOR had brief speed inside. BULLION pressed the pace two wide into the turn then gave way. THE RIDER OF AGAVE KIKD LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED KADESH AND PLACED HIM THIRD.

ENTRY.NAME: Unyielding
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Bullion
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Kadesh
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4-3wide, moved up turn, drifted in 3/16pole, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Union Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Agave Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2wide, checked 3/16pole, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Behavior
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 27 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCE MOVES away alertly, set the pace into the far turn, drifted out nearing the quarter pole, gave up the lead then came on again late under strong handling to get back up in time. LITTLE RONS ROCKET never far back, rallied along the inside through the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch then couldn't hold off the winner in the late stages. SMOOCHER was squeezed at the start, trailed for a half, moved up four wide on the far turn and finished with good courage in the five path. THE GOSPEL OF MARK chased the pace into the far turn, swung wide entering the stretch and lost ground. PLAYING BALL chased the pace three wide into the far turn, steadied nearing the quarter pole, dropped inside entering the stretch then faded. MUCH TIMES TWO close up along the inside, swerved at the half mile pole then dropped out of it.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Moves
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drifted out 1/4p, dropped back, came again

ENTRY.NAME: The Gospel of Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, swung wide, lost ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Smoocher
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start, never far back, finished well 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Much Times Two
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, swerved 1/2 pole, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Playing Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, steadied 1/4 pole, dropped inside, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Rons Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied inside, led late, second best,
